title: (x) Real Estate Investing and - Harrington/Hermosa {Mark S, Mike Y}
content: Curly ornate mystery font - might only be for Windows? Or is there also a Mac version? ![Ornate and curly](http://web.archive.org/web/20050819012600im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/33895.jpg)
author: innocentdesignr

comments.content: Boy, it seems awfully familiar, but the best I've been able to come up with so far is [Acadian](http://web.archive.org/web/20050819012600/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/acadian/). Maybe it's a free Corel font?
It's some version of [Harrington](http://web.archive.org/web/20050819012600/http:/www.identifont.com/show?1ND). It's an old metal face, so it's likely there are other versions of this around.

Harrington was released by Microsoft once in TT for Mac. The font is also sold as [Hermosa](http://web.archive.org/web/20050819012600/http:/www.precisiontype.com/fontsearchres.asp?n=0&tf=0&s=1&results=25) by Richard Beatty Design. Precision Type sells it in all formats except OTF.   
   
(I know this is a late post, but I was gone until yesterday, and Script fonts get my notice.)
